DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate cosmetic performance AIR OPTIX® COLORS contact lens compare FRESHLOOK® COLORBLENDS contact lenses habitual FRESHLOOK® COLORBLENDS contact lens wearer .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Cosmetic Performance AIR OPTIX® COLORS
DOC.detailed_description: In non-dispensing trial , participant wear 4 pair color contact lenses ( gray , blue , green , hazel ) sequentially less 10 minute contralateral fashion ( test lens one eye , control lens eye ) . Randomization take place 4 pair lens eye ( left right ) wear test wore control . Participants select base eye color ( dark v light/medium ) . The primary analysis population ( AP1 ) pre-specified participant eye color habitually wear FRESHLOOK® COLORBLENDS lenses one four color test trial . Pair 1 lens dispense per participant 's habitual lens color .
DOC.criteria: Sign write Informed Consent document . If legal age consent , legally authorize representative must sign Informed Consent document subject must sign Assent document . Have spectacle provide acceptable near vision wear study lenses need evaluate cosmetic lens . Habitually wear FRESHLOOK® COLORBLENDS lenses least two day per week . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Eye injury surgery within twelve week enrollment trial . Preexisting ocular irritation would preclude contact lens fit . Currently enrol clinical trial . Evidence systematic ocular abnormality , infection , disease likely affect successful wear contact lenses use accessory solution determine investigator . Any use medication contact lens wear could contraindicate determined investigator . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
